Time = 1 + 1 = 2 hours

Average Speed = Distance / Time = 3.76 / 2 = 1.88 miles per hour

So, if Mary wants to maintain an average speed of 4 miles per hour, she needs to cover the remaining distance of:

Remaining Distance = Total Distance - Covered Distance = 12 - 3.76 = 8.24 miles

Therefore, Mary needs to walk at a speed of approximately 9.76 miles per hour (8.24 miles / 0.82 hours) to reach her destination within the given time frame.
